laboratory_examinations.findings: NO ENTERIC GRAM NEGATIVE RODS FOUND. NO SALMONELLA OR SHIGELLA FOUND.

The cardiomediastinal silhouette and hilar contours are normal. The right lung is clear. The right hemidiaphragm is elevated. An ill-defined linear opacity is noted within the left upper lobe which might represent a focus of atelectasis/scarring. No pleural effusion or pneumothorax is detected.
